billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

title: Provides additional discharge planning for persons being released from civil confinement
summary: Provides additional discharge planning for persons being released from civil confinement including supervision, electronic monitoring, appropriate clothing, transportation, medication and a service plan.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing additional discharge planning for persons being released from civil confinement
